risk_management_framework.stop_loss_discipline: All positions have defined stops 5-11% below entry
risk_management_framework.profit_taking_strategy: Systematic scaling out at 3 target levels
risk_management_framework.position_sizing_method: Based on stop loss distance and 2% risk rule

phase_1_days_1_3.action: Deploy RM22,000 in Tier 1 core holdings

phase_2_days_4_7.action: Deploy RM12,000 in Tier 2/3 complementary holdings

phase_3_days_8_21.action: Scale into pullback opportunities with RM13,000

phase_4_ongoing.action: Manage and optimize with RM3,000 reserve
phase_4_ongoing.flexibility: Add to winners or keep as cash reserve

profit_target_summary.core_holdings_strategy: Keep 40-50% of best positions long-term (PBBANK, MAXIS, TENAGA, PGAS)

week_1_priorities: Complete MAXIS.KL, MAYBANK.KL, CIMB.KL, TENAGA.KL entries
Begin scaling into UNISEM.KL if dips to 4.75-4.82
weeks_2_3_patience: Wait for PENTA.KL pullback - DO NOT CHASE above 5.20
Continue scaling UNISEM.KL on dips to 4.60-4.68, 4.45-4.55

do_not_chase: PENTA.KL - Current price 5.25 too high, RSI 68.2 overbought
UNISEM.KL - Scale in only, don't buy full position above 4.82
avoid_completely: VSOLAR.KL - Parabolic move, RSI 71.5, wait for 20-30% correction
HLBANK.KL - Neutral pattern, no conviction until breakout or pullback

next_agent_instructions.task: Create comprehensive final investment report consolidating all 7 stages of analysis
required_sections: Final Rankings and Portfolio Construction (RankingEngine output)
next_agent_instructions.target_audience: keng hzou - Medium risk investor with RM50K capital, 12-month horizon
next_agent_instructions.deliverable_format: Comprehensive markdown report suitable for decision-making
